mapper.sql: sid, unumber, usernumber, password, username, phone, srole, userclass, snumber, sex, sage, qq, wechat, grade, college
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (sid, unumber, usernumber, password, username, phone, srole, userclass, snumber, sex, sage, qq, wechat, grade, college) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update user set unumber = #{unumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usernumber = #{usernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srole = #{srole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userclass = #{userclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, snumber = #{snumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sage = #{sage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from user where 1 =1
and snumber like concat('%',#{snumber},'%')
and userclass like concat('%',#{userclass},'%')
and srole like concat('%',#{srole},'%')
and phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
order by snumber desc

select u.snumber,u.unumber,u.username,u.sex,u.sage,u.college,u.grade,u.userclass,u.srole,u.phone from user u where 1=1
and u.snumber like concat('%',#{snumber},'%')
and u.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and u.college like concat('%',#{college},'%')
and u.userclass like concat('%',#{userclass},'%')
and u.srole like concat('%',#{srole},'%')
and u.grade like concat('%',#{grade},'%')
and u.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and u.sex like concat('%',#{sex},'%')
